name: Scattered Seeds
description:
Enjoy some hazardous alien gardening!

I highly recommend using a controller, but keyboard controls are supported as well.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52.

Tools:

  •  Engine: Godot
  • Art: Aseprite
  • Sound: jsfxr
  • Music: Beepbox
  • Color palette: Resurrect 64 by Kerrie Lake
